name: Draggi 2,4 Beta (Updated)
description:
Play as an Abducted Human who was taken into a Realistic Factory in a Deserted Town Called DragTown. Your Objective is to get out of these as fast as possible without falling in the Lava, Gather as much money from each location to buy many objects and Clothes (Currently Not Created Yet, although the money is in the game).

WARNING: the game is currently going through Beta Stages so i am trying new things, if you find bugs or have a suggestion feel free to send me a message on instagram : @applelife4123. i'd be happy to take it into consideration.

Controls: ZASD or ZQSD for movements depending on your keyboard

Shift To Sprint

Control for Slow-Motion

Space For Jumping
